name: bug
description: Something is broken or not working as intended

name: fixed
description: Issue has been resolved with a commit or patch

name: discussion
description: Open thread for architectural ideas or community input

name: enhancement
description: Feature request or improvement beyond current scope

name: refactor
description: Code restructuring without changing functionality

name: documentation
description: Docs, README, or comments need updates

name: question
description: Clarification or inquiry: further information is requested

name: chore
description: Small non-functional tasks like cleanup or minor maintenance

name: in progress
description: Actively being worked on

name: blocked
description: Cannot proceed until another issue/PR is resolved

name: needs review
description: Awaiting code review or feedback

name: wontfix
description: Decision made not to address this issue

name: duplicate
description: Same as another issue

name: invalid
description: Not a valid bug or request

name: priority: critical
description: Highest urgency; must be addressed immediately

name: priority: high
description: Must be addressed urgently

name: priority: medium
description: Important but not urgent

name: priority: low
description: Nice-to-have, can wait

name: frontend
description: Frontend/UI related work

name: backend
description: Backend/API related work

name: security-advisory
description: Security vulnerabilities and remediation tracking.

name: performance
description: Speed or efficiency improvements

name: testing
description: Unit tests, integration tests, CI/CD coverage

name: maintenance
description: Dependency updates, version bumps, cleanup tasks

name: good first issue
description: Simple issue suitable for new contributors

name: help wanted
description: Extra attention is needed & contributions welcome
